name: Boy Dash Adventure
description:
Boy- Dash Adventure is an endless jump, run, shoot and slide game that will keep you delighted for hours. If you are looking for run and jump adventure games, this super jumper game is the one for you.

In this adventure jump game, you will have to overcome challenges, slide through the obstacles, collect coins, and shoot your enemies to save yourself. This game is one of those fun adventure games that keep you in your finger all day long. We have designed this game for people who love adventure and excitement.
